activities: SHL provides assessments and other talent measurement solutions and services to clients. In the course of providing those assessments and services, we have a need to collect, process, and use personal information from EU-based candidates and employees of our clients. We also collect and process personal information of our EU-based employees and contractors to administer our internal human resources functions.
address: 555 North Point Center East, Suite 600 (6th Floor)
corpofftitle1: General Counsel, Chief Compliance Officer, & Corporate Secretary
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom

recoursemech: SHL agrees that any disputes regarding its privacy policies and related actions regarding data from Europe can be heard by the European Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs), or the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC), and we will be subject to the determinations of those bodies. Any complaints about SHL’s adherence to the practices described in its privacy policy statement or non-compliance with the Safe Harbor Principles should first be addressed to Lisa Branco at lbranco@executiveboard.com.
